programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Double Agent. The Cornelia Marie taps American satellites to spy on the Russians while Scott Campbell Jr. pioneers a long-dormant fishery. And, Wild Bill faces big setbacks. S16, Ep5

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: The Bleeding Edge. Johnathan goes under the knife at sea and Junior bets it all while chasing the elusive Golden King crab. Plus, Wild Bill faces an unruly greenhorn. S16, Ep6

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: Refreshing The Cooper Cottage. The Cooper family refresh the cottage their grandfather built in the 1970s. The team update the kitchen and bedrooms and repair access to the loft. S7, Ep5

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: Rivalry At The Chadwick Cabin. The team tackle a family's 1906 cabin and become divided over a high school rivalry. They fix a rotting ceiling and create an outdoor bar and fire pit. S7, Ep6

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack Returns. A happy homecoming for the Brown family means hard work to get Browntown back on track. A risky haul with an all-or-nothing offer may be the only answer. S3, Ep8

programme.title: Yukon Men
programme.desc: Bloodlines. As a new road opens Tanana to the outside world, Charlie confronts and outsider in his own family. Meanwhile, Tanana native, Lorraine, recovers after critical surgery. S6, Ep2

programme.title: Yukon Men
programme.desc: Boiling Point. When a mum tries teaching her daughter the native ways it becomes a lesson in survival. And one local trapper finds his ancestral lands have been invaded. S6, Ep3

programme.title: Homestead Rescue: Raney Ranch
programme.desc: Alaskans Unite. Misty must complete her cabin roof without help from Maciah. Marty gives a cabin-warming gift to Mollee, and the family commit to a mini rescue. S1, Ep7

programme.title: Homestead Rescue: Raney Ranch
programme.desc: Twist Of Fate. With the first winter storm just days away, the Raney clan rush to seal in Misty's cabin. But a devastating fire threatens to derail their plans. S1, Ep8

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: The Bushmen risk their lives in the fight to get their one-tonne digger down a 20-metre deep mine shaft. Plus, new alliances are forged as the Boulder Boys hit pay dirt. S3, Ep6

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: The Bushmen dodge rockfalls in a potentially deadly new mine. The Fire Crew close in on a new deposit of black opal and the Boulder Boys struggle to drain their pit. S3, Ep7

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Supermoon Storm. An epic supermoon storm wreaks havoc on tides. The Coast Guard attempts a rescue mission, while Wild Bill faces his worst nightmare as a greenhorn goes overboard. S14, Ep15

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Greenhorn Overboard. Saga and Cornelia Marie battle colossal waves of the supermoon storm. Plus, on the Summer Bay, a deckhand goes over the rail into the icy Bering Sea. S14, Ep16

programme.title: New: Tiny House, Big Living
programme.desc: Empty Nester's Eco Tiny. A mother seeks to build a tiny home with lots of eco-friendly features. Her design includes hidden counter space and an entertainment area. S5, Ep3

programme.title: New: Tiny House, Big Living
programme.desc: Family Of Five's Tiny Skoolie. An adventurous family of five set out to convert a school bus into a house built for travelling. Their design includes an area for home schooling. S5, Ep4

programme.title: New: Tiny House, Big Living
programme.desc: Nautical Tiny House. A couple take inspiration from a 17th century ship while creating their dream house. They hire an expert to design an unusual water pillow system. S5, Ep5

programme.title: New: Tiny House, Big Living
programme.desc: Tiny Fisherman's House. A fishing guide has decided to give tiny living a try. He builds the ultimate fisherman's crash pad with special racks for his rods and waders. S5, Ep6

programme.title: Jeremy Wade's Dark Waters
programme.desc: Ice Age Predator. Fisherman and adventurer, Jeremy Wade, is on an epic journey to catch a prehistoric monster - the man-sized pike in the lakes of Ireland. Will he find it? S1, Ep3

programme.title: Naked And Afraid
programme.desc: Bite Club. A Bear, shark and rattlesnake attack survivor teams up with Brooke, an elite hunter. Together they tackle vicious lions and hyena in the harsh African feeding ground. S5, Ep8

programme.title: Naked And Afraid
programme.desc: Threesome. When a third survivalist crashes the challenge, tension and jealousy prove just as threatening as the heat, piranha and jaguars of the Ecuadorian rainforest. S5, Ep9

programme.desc: A Container Conversion. A family ask the team to transform an old shipping container into their dream cabin. They tackle the build offsite before transporting it to its forever home. S7, Ep8

programme.title: Yukon Men
programme.desc: Less Than Zero. Villagers race to prepare for an early cold snap. Stan uses Yukon engineering to make a risky repair to his truck while Charlie tries to stop a deadly fire. S6, Ep4

programme.title: Yukon Men
programme.desc: Running On Empty. The countdown to the dark days causes a mad dash for food. Chris and Jessi venture onto thin ice to net whitefish while Pat turns to the town dump to feed his pigs. S6, Ep5

programme.title: Homestead Rescue: Raney Ranch
programme.desc: Fire On The Forty. An inferno engulfs Marty and Mollee's cabin at the onset of winter, and the Raneys rush to complete the unfinished clifftop cabin with heat, water and power. S1, Ep9

programme.title: Homestead Rescue: Raney Ranch
programme.desc: On Thin Ice. Marty attempts a treacherous trip across a frozen river. And, Misty and Maciah build a pump house to secure the family's new water source on the Upper 20. S1, Ep10

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: The Bushmen are desperate for a breakthrough after a run of bad luck. And the Young Guns are under financial strain and fall out over their new mine. S3, Ep8

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: The Tunnel Rats are under extra pressure as rival miners close in on their claim. And, the Bushmen must brave an abandoned mine to remove a dead animal. S3, Ep9

programme.title: Deadliest Catch

programme.desc: No Safe Harbor. A severe arctic gale batters the fleet, forcing captains to fight extreme wind and waves. For a second time, a greenhorn's life hangs in the balance on Summer Bay. S14, Ep18

programme.desc: One of the most experienced team members is fired. The team is pushed to the brink of death when they get lost in a treacherous desert. S1, Ep2

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Manhunter: Jake leads a manhunt after an assassination attempt is made on a city councillor. Holt adjusts to his new position as a uniformed officer.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine

programme.title: Below Deck Sailing Yacht

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A High-Pitched Buzz and Training Wheels: Sheldon dismantles the fridge to stop it making an annoying humming noise but must pay for the damage he's done.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Rival Prodigy and Sir Isaac Neutron: When Sheldon's mentor Dr John Sturgis bonds with Paige, another 10-year-old genius, Sheldon is overcome with jealousy.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The Closet Case: Phil helps Haley convince Claire to allow Dylan to move in temporarily, but when he sees how intimate living together means, he has second thoughts.

programme.title: The Goldbergs

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: As the McQueens prepare for Bobby's funeral, Mercedes confronts the person who she believes killed her son... Meanwhile, Prince gets some upsetting news. And will a secret fling be exposed?

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Mercedes says an emotional goodbye to Bobby. Meanwhile, one smug resident watches a heated confrontation unfold. And Prince is in an awkward situation when two villagers ask him out.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: The leading news stories of the moment.

programme.title: Wrath of Man
programme.desc: (2021) Jason Statham reunites with director Guy Ritchie to give it both barrels as a mysterious hardman working for a money truck firm that keeps getting hit. But is he an inside man?

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: (2007) Western starring Christian Bale and Russell Crowe. An impoverished rancher tries to earn some money and his family's respect by escorting a dangerous outlaw on his way to jail.

programme.title: Antlers
programme.desc: (2021) Dark, brooding horror with Keri Russell. A teacher tries to help a troubled pupil. She's in for a shock. The boy's bringing home roadkill for something that's locked in his basement.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3
programme.desc: (2018) Spooky animated family comedy. On a monster-friendly cruise, Dracula (Adam Sandler) falls in love - with a vampire slayer!

programme.title: Ferdinand
programme.desc: (2017) Charming animated bovine road movie from the makers of Ice Age. A huge but gentle bull (voiced by John Cena) tries to get home after being sent away to a bull fighting ranch.

programme.title: Sword of Sherwood Forest
programme.desc: (1960) Adventure with Richard Greene, Peter Cushing and a young Oliver Reed. Can Robin Hood foil the villainous Sheriff of Nottingham's evil plan to murder the Archbishop of Canterbury?

programme.title: Operation Petticoat
programme.desc: (1959) Second World War comedy. Tony Curtis and Cary Grant play members of the crew of a submarine that's painted bright pink just as the Japanese launch their assault in the Pacific.

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
programme.desc: (1997) Romcom with Julia Roberts and Cameron Diaz. Is it okay for a girl to wreck a wedding because she only realises she loves a guy when he tells her he's getting married to someone else?

programme.title: American Gangster Special
programme.desc: Denzel Washington, Russell Crowe and director Ridley Scott talk about making American Gangster, the 2007 crime epic based on an unlikely true story.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: (2007) True crime thriller directed by Ridley Scott. An outcast New York cop (Russell Crowe) is charged with bringing down entrepreneurial Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas (Denzel Washington).

programme.title: Pixie
programme.desc: (2020) Dark comedy with Olivia Cooke, Alec Baldwin and Colm Meaney. A young woman devises a series of elaborate heists and schemes to fund a new life.

programme.title: Bitch Ass
programme.desc: (2022) Slasher horror. It's 1999 LA, and a bunch of kids get sent to rip off a house in their hood. Unfortunately, it belongs to a masked serial killer who likes to play games... literally.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Miracle on 34th Street
programme.desc: (1994) Festive family drama. Richard Attenborough stars as a department store Santa who insists he's the real Santa Claus. But can he prove it in court?

programme.title: The Personal History of David...
programme.desc: ...Copperfield Interview Special: Director Armando Iannucci and actor Dev Patel, who stars in the title role, talk about bringing Charles Dickens' beloved novel to the screen.

programme.title: The Kid Who Would Be King
programme.desc: (2019) Fantasy adventure. A 12-year-old from modern-day suburbia finds King Arthur's sword Excalibur and must save the country from a sinister sorceress. With Patrick Stewart.

programme.title: The Electrical Life of Louis...
programme.desc: ...Wain Interview Special: Stars Benedict Cumberbatch and Claire Foy talk about making director Will Sharpe's eccentric biopic of artist and inventor Louis Wain.

programme.title: Tora! Tora! Tora!
programme.desc: (1970) Oscar-winning drama portraying the bombing of Pearl Harbor, from both American and Japanese perspectives. With Joseph Cotten and So Yamamura.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: (2019) Action comedy with Kristen Stewart, Naomi Scott and Ella Balinska. When an engineer blows the whistle on a deadly device, the Angels put their lives on the line to save the planet.

programme.title: Uncharted
programme.desc: (2022) Going-for-gold action. Tom Holland and Mark Wahlberg compare abs as they scour the globe for an olde explorer's lost gold. The heat is on. The time is right. Only the best survive.

programme.title: Jackass Forever
programme.desc: (2022) Outrageous adult comedy with Johnny Knoxville. The Jackasses reunite to test if older really is wiser by inflicting more playfully real pain on each other - just for fun of course.

programme.title: Funny Pages
programme.desc: (2022) Dark, adults-only, coming-of-age comedy about a troubled schoolboy who quits education to become a comic book artist - with the help of an array of questionable older men...

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Dragonball Evolution
programme.desc: (2009) Martial arts adventure. Justin Chatwin stars as the leader of a mystical band of warriors who are out to save the world from the ancient demon Lord Piccolo. With James Marsters.

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: (2018) High-octane sci-fi action adventure starring Hailee Steinfeld. When Charlie drives home a clapped-out VW Beetle, she gets more than she bargained for: a huge robotic alien.

programme.title: Prince Valiant
programme.desc: (1954) Swashbuckling adventure. One of King Arthur's courtiers, the Viking Prince Valiant (Robert Wagner) uncovers the evil Sir Brack's (James Mason) plot to kill the king. Can he foil him?

programme.title: Spies in Disguise
programme.desc: (2019) Animated spy comedy caper with the voice of Will Smith. The 'world's most awesome spy' gets framed and has to go undercover as a pigeon to prove his innocence.

programme.title: 10 Things I Hate About You
programme.desc: (1999) Teen comedy with Julia Stiles and Heath Ledger. A student is furious to discover her prom date was bribed by her sister to invite her. But confusion ensues when he falls for her.

programme.title: Nope
programme.desc: (2022) Western-infused sci-fi chiller with Daniel Kaluuya and Keke Palmer as cash-strapped horse trainers who try to supplement their income by filming alien goings-on at their ranch.

programme.title: Ready or Not
programme.desc: (2019) Wickedly funny comedy horror starring Samara Weaving. A bride finds herself being hunted down by her new in-laws when she is asked to observe a deadly family tradition.

programme.desc: (2021) Jason Statham reunites with director Guy Ritchie to give it both barrels as a mysterious hardman working for a money truck firm that keeps getting hit. But is he an inside man?

programme.desc: (2022) Dark, adults-only, coming-of-age comedy about a troubled schoolboy who quits education to become a comic book artist - with the help of an array of questionable older men...

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Dragonball Evolution
programme.desc: (2009) Martial arts adventure. Justin Chatwin stars as the leader of a mystical band of warriors who are out to save the world from the ancient demon Lord Piccolo. With James Marsters.

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: (2018) High-octane sci-fi action adventure starring Hailee Steinfeld. When Charlie drives home a clapped-out VW Beetle, she gets more than she bargained for: a huge robotic alien.

programme.title: Prince Valiant
programme.desc: (1954) Swashbuckling adventure. One of King Arthur's courtiers, the Viking Prince Valiant (Robert Wagner) uncovers the evil Sir Brack's (James Mason) plot to kill the king. Can he foil him?

programme.title: Spies in Disguise
programme.desc: (2019) Animated spy comedy caper with the voice of Will Smith. The 'world's most awesome spy' gets framed and has to go undercover as a pigeon to prove his innocence.

programme.title: 10 Things I Hate About You
programme.desc: (1999) Teen comedy with Julia Stiles and Heath Ledger. A student is furious to discover her prom date was bribed by her sister to invite her. But confusion ensues when he falls for her.

programme.title: Nope
programme.desc: (2022) Western-infused sci-fi chiller with Daniel Kaluuya and Keke Palmer as cash-strapped horse trainers who try to supplement their income by filming alien goings-on at their ranch.

programme.title: Cooking with the Stars
programme.desc: Emma Willis and Tom Allen present the celebrity cookery contest in which famous faces are mentored by world-class chefs to compete in culinary battles. In the first edition, actress Natalie Cassidy goes head to head with radio presenter Jordan North, and reality stars Jack Osbourne and Jessica Wright go up against each other, attempting to deliver gourmet dishes on a budget of just three pounds per portion. Who will go straight through and which two stars will face each other in the cook-off? Others taking part throughout the series are Hugh Dennis, Ekin-Su Cülcüloglu, Kelly Hoppen and Shaun Wright-Phillips

programme.title: Unwind with STV
programme.desc: Daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection

programme.title: Jimmy's Taste of Florida
programme.desc: Jimmy Doherty embarks on a culinary tour of the Sunshine State, starting in Pensacola, where he explores the city's food scene with chef Blake and uncovers the Southern delicacy of boiled peanuts. Continuing to Panama City Beach, Jimmy meets champion oyster shucker Honor Allen and finds himself in an unwinnable contest, before moving on to a family-run shop to try his hand at doughnut making

programme.title: Good Morning Britain
programme.desc: Morning magazine featuring a lively mix of news and current affairs, plus health, entertainment and lifestyle features

programme.title: Lorraine
programme.desc: Early morning chat show presented by Lorraine Kelly, with celebrity interviews, entertainment news, cooking tips, fashion features and musical guests.

programme.title: This Morning
programme.desc: A mix of celebrity chat, lifestyle features, advice and competitions

programme.title: Loose Women
programme.desc: More celebrity interviews and topical debate from a female perspective

programme.title: ITV Lunchtime News
programme.desc: The key headlines from the day so far

programme.title: STV News and Weather
programme.desc: Including regional weather forecast

programme.title: Celebrity Catchphrase
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts another charity edition of the game show, with Charlie Hedges, Luke Kempner and Jeremy Vine trying to say what they see as they guess well-known phrases for the chance to win a £50,000 jackpot for their chosen good causes

programme.title: Lingo
programme.desc: South Wales couple Rebecca and Rhys, Londoner John and his daughter Becca, and Birmingham brothers Inam and Sanaullah try to work out words that appear in the Lingo grids and Puzzlewords. Presented by Adil Ray

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents as Judith from Glasgow, Sam from London, Lee from Lincoln and Pam from Liverpool pit their wits against one of the ruthless Chasers in the hope of winning a potential prize pot worth thousands of pounds. They work as a team and play strategically to answer general knowledge questions against the clock and race down the game board to the exit without being caught

programme.title: STV News at Six and Weather
programme.desc: Including regional weather forecast

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: A round-up of the day's news headlines and talking points from the UK and around the world

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Aaron is fighting his guilt and decides the night before was just a one-off, Mack is unable to hide feeling hurt that Charity hasn't contacted him after kicking him out. Gabby continues to try to persuade Vinny to report Kammy to the police

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Gated estate Challis Court is a tight-knit community for retired police officers, but when a new arrival is found dead, the other residents regard the murder as both an affront and a challenge. Barnaby investigates and realises that the killer is likely to be an ex-police officer too. Crime drama, starring Neil Dudgeon, with Tom Conti

programme.title: ITV News at Ten
programme.desc: A fresh perspective on the major stories of the day, featuring national and international news, with reports and analysis from ITV's correspondents

programme.title: Scotland Tonight

programme.title: James Martin's Great British Adventure
programme.desc: James crosses over the Irish Sea to Northern Ireland, where he is joined by famous local chef Paul Rankin. Their first port of call is the Giant's Causeway, where James cooks a fish stew for the crowds, followed by a visit to a family farm in Limavady, where Paul learns how their award-winning rapeseed oil is produced. Things get competitive as the chefs compete in a hovercraft race, and finally James takes to the seas to fish for mackerel

programme.title: Matthew Perry: A Hollywood Tragedy
programme.desc: Friends star Perry's sudden death in October 2023 shocked the world. A known addict, he was found to have ketamine in his system and months later five individuals were charged with illegally supplying him the drug. This documentary explores Perry's rise to fame and his tragic final days with insights from castmates, friends, law enforcement and Perry's own candid accounts

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: A round-up of the day's news headlines and talking points from the UK and around the world

programme.title: Channel Off Air
programme.desc: A round-up of the day's news headlines and talking points from the UK and around the world

programme.title: Tom Kerridge Cooks Spain
programme.desc: The chef journeys from Extremadura to Murcia in his vintage food truck as he heads out on Lake Orellena to discover secret spots that are best for catching crayfish. He also cooks up a celebration of an ultimate take on a crayfish cocktail. Tom's journey then takes him to Murcia, where local producer Shelley shows him what it takes to harvest the Piel de Sapo, a melon loved in Spain and gaining popularity in the UK

programme.title: The Fortune Hotel
programme.desc: Only five pairs remain as things turn frosty with a Hotel Game like no other. Guests pick ice lollies with unexpected flavours and even more unexpected consequences. While some sticks spell safety, others hand players a power to target their rivals. Later, it's off to the historic streets of St George's for a high-energy Day Trip Challenge involving hotel staff and a well-known phrase

programme.title: ITV News at Ten
programme.desc: A fresh perspective on the major stories of the day, featuring national and international news, with reports and analysis from ITV's correspondents

programme.title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Sci-fi action adventure starring James Franco and Freida Pinto. When scientist Will Rodman's programme of drug experiments to find a cure for Alzheimer's disease is shut down he secretly takes an offspring from one of the chimpanzees he was using into his home and names him Caesar. Caesar has inherited the effects of the trial drug and begins to show remarkable intelligence, a development that will put him on a violent collision course with the humans who have abused him.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell present the stories of two men hoping to find birth family. Joe McGregor was adopted as a baby in Bermuda in the 1970s and grew up in Norfolk in a loving family, yet he still yearns to find his birth family. Simon Miller's mum's dying wish was that he should find the daughter who she gave up for adoption just a few years before he was born

programme.title: Cooking with the Stars
programme.desc: Emma Willis and Tom Allen present the celebrity cookery contest in which famous faces are mentored by world-class chefs to compete in culinary battles. In the first edition, actress Natalie Cassidy goes head to head with radio presenter Jordan North, and reality stars Jack Osbourne and Jessica Wright go up against each other, attempting to deliver gourmet dishes on a budget of just three pounds per portion. Who will go straight through and which two stars will face each other in the cook-off? Others taking part throughout the series are Hugh Dennis, Ekin-Su Cülcüloglu, Kelly Hoppen and Shaun Wright-Phillips

programme.title: Unwind with STV
programme.desc: Daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection

programme.title: Jimmy's Taste of Florida
programme.desc: Jimmy Doherty embarks on a culinary tour of the Sunshine State, starting in Pensacola, where he explores the city's food scene with chef Blake and uncovers the Southern delicacy of boiled peanuts. Continuing to Panama City Beach, Jimmy meets champion oyster shucker Honor Allen and finds himself in an unwinnable contest, before moving on to a family-run shop to try his hand at doughnut making

programme.title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Sci-fi action adventure starring James Franco and Freida Pinto. When scientist Will Rodman's programme of drug experiments to find a cure for Alzheimer's disease is shut down he secretly takes an offspring from one of the chimpanzees he was using into his home and names him Caesar. Caesar has inherited the effects of the trial drug and begins to show remarkable intelligence, a development that will put him on a violent collision course with the humans who have abused him.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell present the stories of two men hoping to find birth family. Joe McGregor was adopted as a baby in Bermuda in the 1970s and grew up in Norfolk in a loving family, yet he still yearns to find his birth family. Simon Miller's mum's dying wish was that he should find the daughter who she gave up for adoption just a few years before he was born

programme.title: Cooking with the Stars
programme.desc: Emma Willis and Tom Allen present the celebrity cookery contest in which famous faces are mentored by world-class chefs to compete in culinary battles. In the first edition, actress Natalie Cassidy goes head to head with radio presenter Jordan North, and reality stars Jack Osbourne and Jessica Wright go up against each other, attempting to deliver gourmet dishes on a budget of just three pounds per portion. Who will go straight through and which two stars will face each other in the cook-off? Others taking part throughout the series are Hugh Dennis, Ekin-Su Cülcüloglu, Kelly Hoppen and Shaun Wright-Phillips
